# Introduction {-}
This book contains a set of GSL water quality and nutrient analyses, figures, and code for generating them. All data are drawn from USGS NWIS or EPA WQP.  
The source code for generating this book is available via [GitHub repository](https://github.com/jakevl/gsl-nutrients-2019){target="_blank"}.  

This project remains in active development and does not represent any official agency position.
